# DRIVE & OVERDRIVE End-of-Life (EoL) {#drive-overdrive-end-of-life-eol .title}

[](javascript:window.print() "Print this article"){.printArticle
aria-label="Print this Article"}

### [Product End-Of-Life Schedule]{style="font-weight: 400;"}

[\
]{style="font-weight: 400;"}

+-----------------------+-----------------------+-----------------------+
| App Name              | Platform              | End-Of-Life Date      |
+-----------------------+-----------------------+-----------------------+
| Anki DRIVE            | -   Android           | November 17, 2017     |
|                       | -   iOS               |                       |
|                       | -   Kindle            |                       |
+-----------------------+-----------------------+-----------------------+
| Anki OVERDRIVE        | -   Android           | October 15, 2021      |
|                       | -   iOS               |                       |
|                       | -   Kindle            |                       |
+-----------------------+-----------------------+-----------------------+
| Anki OVERDRIVE: Fast  | -   Android           | October 15, 2021      |
| & Furious Edition     | -   iOS               |                       |
|                       | -   Kindle            |                       |
+-----------------------+-----------------------+-----------------------+

------------------------------------------------------------------------

On November 17, 2017, we officially ended support of the Drive app and
related hardware. Official end-of-life for the Anki OVERDRIVE and
OVERDRIVE: Fast and Furious Edition occurred on October 15th,
2021. While we realize End-of-Life for any product or app can be
unwelcome news, we do want to be clear on how this will impact you.

**Please Note:** Digital Dream Labs is still able to support [Car
Repairs](https://www.digitaldreamlabs.com/products/repair-center){target="_blank"}
for most vehicles to get the most out of your DRIVE and OVERDRIVE
hardware. We also provide [car
tires](https://www.digitaldreamlabs.com/products/overdrive-tires){target="_blank"}
alone if you do not need full car refurbishment.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Replacing Anki Drive, OverDrive, and OverDrive: Fast & Furious

We now have OverDrive 2.6 available for use with cars from the Drive,
OverDrive, and OverDrive: Fast & Furious kits so you can keep racing!

#### Download:

[Google
Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.digitaldreamlabs.retrodrive){target="_blank"}

::: sections
[Apple App
Store](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/overdrive-2-6/id1512032170){target="_blank"}

------------------------------------------------------------------------

[](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/overdrive-2-6/id1512032170){target="_blank"}**For
Anki DRIVE, we no longer:**

-   [Maintain or evolve the DRIVE app or provide any support for device
    compatibility.]{style="font-weight: 400;"}
-   [Offer any active technical support for the DRIVE app or any related
    hardware.]{style="font-weight: 400;"}
-   [Stock replacement/piece part items such as Cars, Tracks, Tires for
    sale.]{style="font-weight: 400;"}

**For Anki OVERDRIVE, we no longer:**

-   Maintain or evolve the OVERDRIVE app or provide any support for
    device compatibility, except for OverDrive 2.6.

**For Anki OVERDRIVE: Fast & Furious Edition, we no longer:**

-   Maintain or evolve the OVERDRIVE Fast & Furious Edition app or
    provide any support for device compatibility.
-   Offer any active technical support for the OVERDRIVE Fast & Furious
    Edition app or any edition-specific hardware like track pieces.
:::
